assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no conflict of interest relevant to this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed in this studies involving human participants were in accordance with the institutional review board of Shizuoka Cancer Center (No.27-J139-27–1-3) and Tokyo Metropolitan Institute of Medical Science (No.18–17), and with the 1964 Helsinki Declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Witten informed consent was obtained from all participants at their entry into this study.
